data.title: How do I Adjust Who Collects Payments in my Store?
data.text:
By default, Pic-Time is the selling entity and will collect all payments from your store sales. With this option we handle the appropriate sales taxes for orders, and then pay out any profits from the orders to you. More details below.

Alternatively, you can choose to collect the payments yourself through your own payment gateway. At the time of writing, we support the payment gateways PayPal, Stripe, Square and Offline. With this option, when a customer places an order in your store the payment will be processed through your nominated payment gateway. You will receive the amount paid in full. Pic-Time will then collect any costs associated with the payment (production costs, shipping costs) from you before the order is pushed into production. More details below.

The total profit amount is over $20

The sale was made 7 days prior to the deposit date

Your account information has your PayPal email, address, phone number, Name on Invoice and Tax Number

Use a currency other than USD

Self-fulfill products in the store (except for Free and Beginner Plans)
